titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Joseph J. Mooney theatre programs and scrapbook 1977.290
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:18:31 +0000.

did.unittitle: Joseph J. Mooney theatre programs and scrapbook
did.abstract: Loose programs and a scrapbook of programs and clippings relating to performances at various Brooklyn theatres in the 1870s. Items also relate to the Brooklyn Theatre Fire.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Joseph J. Mooney theatre programs and scrapbook, 1977.290, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
